engine: Four stroke, transverse three cylinder, DOHC, 4 valves per cylinder
rear_suspension: Mono shock absorber with     adjustable extension and spring load
frame: Front ASD     steel tube trellis, fastened with drawer    screws to boxed rear section,     aluminium alloy castings.
front_suspension: Marzocchi 50mm Ø     upside down fork, ASD steel tube     trellis, oscillating main fork
front_brakes: 2 x 320 mm Ø discs, 4 piston calipers
induction: Electronic injection with 1    injector per cylinder
rear_brakes: Single 240 mm Ø disc, 2 piston caliper
